item.description:
Join us for lunch at Wagamama's in Harvard Square. After lunch, we will take a short walk over to the Dragonboat Festival on the Charles River (Weeks Bridge) to enjoy the dragonboat races, cultural performances, arts & crafts. If you are still hungry or thirsty there are food vendors selling a wide variety of asian foods, bubble tea and zong zi. Please be on time to Wagamama's.

We can also cheer on our meetup members (Tran, Timmy & Ricardo) who are participating in the Dragonboat races for the NAAAPBoston team. Come and enjoy the festive day.

Click on the link for more info.

http://www.bostondrag...

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Lunch and Dragonboat Festival
